You need a libogc from snes9x-gx, get here:
http://code.google.com/p/snes9x-gx/downloads/detail?name=libogc-30-04-2009.zip


= Instructions (from snes9x-gx) =

 # Download the source from SVN.
 # Download and install devkitPro. You only need to install devkitPPC.
 # Download the Snes9x devkitPro libraries from the Downloads page, and overwrite the libraries in your devkitPro installation folder.
 # Make and you're done!
